abstract: German warning to neutrals against acceptance of Brit contraband control seen as unofficial answer to Scandinavian protests
snippet: BERLIN, March 1 (UP)--Germany issued a sharp warning to neutral nations today that acceptance of the British contraband control would be regarded by the German Government as "not in accordance with their neutrality or sovereignty."...

headline.main: NEUTRALS WARNED BY GERMANY AGAIN; Their Acceptance of Britain's Navicert System Is Held a Violation of Neutrality NAZI SEA WAR IS UPHELD Protests by Scandinavia Are Bluntly Rejected--British Sea 'Sheer Intimidation'

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, March 1 (UP)--Germany issued a sharp warning to neutral nations today that acceptance of the British contraband control would be regarded by the German Government as "not in accordance with their neutrality or sovereignty."
